meanings.definition: To connect or link two or more things together.
meanings.sent1: The wires interconnecting the devices were carefully secured.
meanings.sent2: The roads in the city are interconnecting, making it easy to navigate.
meanings.sent3: The interconnecting vines in the garden seemed to have a mind of their own.
meanings.sent4: Her stories were like interconnecting threads, weaving a tapestry of memories.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle pieces interconnecting perfectly revealed the hidden picture.

meanings.sent1: The interconnecting rooms in the hotel provided a spacious feel.
meanings.sent2: The interconnecting flights made the journey more convenient.
meanings.sent3: The interconnecting gears in the clockwork toy fascinated the children.
meanings.sent4: Their lives were like interconnecting paths, always crossing at unexpected moments.
meanings.sent5: The interconnecting branches of the trees created a natural canopy overhead.
